mainWorkout.title: Main Workout
mainWorkout.description: AMRAP 20 min: 5 pull-ups, 10 push-ups, 15 air squats

preWorkout.title: Pre Workout
preWorkout.description: Complete as many meters as possible in 10 minutes of: Farmers carry

mainWorkout.title: Main Workout
mainWorkout.description: 4 rounds for time: 10 push-ups, 15 squats, 20 sit-ups

warmup.title: Warm Up
warmup.description: 5 rounds of 20 seconds jump rope, 40 seconds active rest. Followed by dynamic stretching for whole body

preWorkout.title: Pre Workout
preWorkout.description: Kettlebell drills: 2 sets of 10 kettlebell swings, 10 kettlebell goblet squats

mainWorkout.title: Main Workout
mainWorkout.description: 5 Rounds for Time: 8 Kettlebell thrusters (each side), 15 kettlebell swings, 400m run

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.description: 10 minutes of yoga-inspired cool down stretches

notes: Hydrate well & focus on deep breathing during cooldown
